content: HPS-1 R Impact anchor (304 stainless steel nail) Economical impact plastic anchor with 304 stainless steel screw ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Stainless steel hammer-driven screw for outdoor use Quick impact installation using a hammer The hammer-driven screw can also be driven or unscrewed using a screwdriver For universal use on many materials, including perforated brick and block Corrosion-resistant for outdoor use Applications Fastening components for electrical and plumbing installations Anchoring light frames, battens and profiles in hollow and solid base materials Anchoring concrete, brick and masonry ties ### TECHNICAL DATA: Head configuration: Flat head Approvals / Test reports: N/A Material, corrosion: Stainless steel, A2, Plastic Technical Data | Head configuration | Flat head | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Stainless steel, A2, Plastic | Type of fixing | Through-fastening ### ITEMS- 230520 - Impact anchor HPS-1 1/4 x 1 SS304 - Package Size 200 pc Package Contents: - 1x HPS-1 R 1/4X1 Impact anchor - 246937 - Impact anchor HPS-1 1/4 x 1 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2400x HPS-1 R 1/4X1 Impact anchor - 230521 - Impact anchor HPS-1 1/4 x 1-5/8 SS304 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HPS-1 R 1/4X1 5/8 Impact anchor - 246938 - Impact anchor HPS-1 1/4 x 1-5/8 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 900x HPS-1 R 1/4X1 5/8 Impact anchor - 230522 - Impact anc HPS-1 1/4 x 2-1/16 SS304 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HPS-1 R 1/4X2 1/16 Impact anchor - 230523 - Impact anchor HPS-1 1/4 x 2-5/8 SS304 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HPS-1 R 1/4X2 5/8 Impact anchor
